Function reference

All functions

BSAExperiment-class
A class to store data related to bulk segregant analysis (BSA) experiments.
BSAExperiment()
A constructor for the BSAExperiment class
BSAResults-class
Store statistical results of BSA Analysis
aggregate(<BSAExperiment>)
Aggregate Data in BSAExperiment
`altDepth<-`(<BSAExperiment>) altDepth(<BSAExperiment>)
Getter/Setter of the BSAExperiment altDepth assay matrix
applyFilter(<BSAExperiment>)
Apply the variant, sample and/or matrix filters to a BSAExperiment object
calculateGSmoothPvalues()
Non-parametric estimation of the null distribution of G'
calculateGStatistic()
Calculates the G statistic
`comparisons<-`(<BSAExperiment>) comparisons(<BSAExperiment>)
Getter/Setter of the BSAExperiment comparison slot
createBSAResults()
Calculate marker frequency statistics for a objectxperiment object
createPopulationDepthList()
Population Depth List Object Constructor
deltaSnpIndex(<BSAExperiment>)
Calculate \(\Delta\)(Alt Allele Frequency) Between Two Populations
extract_alt_freq_dataframe()
Extract alternative frequency data frame
filter_args()
Utility function to filter arguments
find_breakpoints()
Find Breakpoints in Allele Frequency Data
get_mode()
Calculate Mode of a Numeric Vector
hampelFilterGRanges()
Hampel Filter for Genomic Data in GRanges Object
is_noisy()
Determine if a Data Point is Noisy
makeBSAExperimentFromGatkTable()
Create a BSAExperiment object from a GATK varianttotable Table
`matrixFilter<-`(<BSAExperiment>) matrixFilter(<BSAExperiment>)
Getter and Setter of the BSAExperiment matrixFilter matrix
plot_breakpoints()
Plot Breakpoints on Allele Frequency Data
populationDepths(<BSAExperiment>)
Extract population alt and ref allele depths from a BSAExperiment object
process_chromosome()
Process Chromosome Data
refDepth(<BSAExperiment>)
Get the Reference Depths from the BSAExperiment
`sampleFilter<-`(<BSAExperiment>) sampleFilter(<BSAExperiment>)
Getter and Setter of the BSAExperiment sampleFilter vector
simulateDeltaSnpIndex()
Simulates the change in Alternate Allele Frequency between population_2 and population_1
simulateDeltaSnpIndexCI()
Simulate \(\Delta\)(Alt Allele Frequency) Confidence Intervals
simulatePopulationSnpIndex()
Simulate a Population's Alternate Allele Frequency
smoothAlleleFrequencyMetric()
Calculate tricube weighted statistics for each allele
snpIndex(<BSAExperiment>)
Calculate the SNP index of a given sample
summary(<BSAResults>)
Summarize a BSAResults object
`totalDepth<-`(<BSAExperiment>) totalDepth(<BSAExperiment>)
Getter/Setter of the BSAExperiment totalDepth assay matrix
`variantFilter<-`(<BSAExperiment>) variantFilter(<BSAExperiment>)
Getter/Setter of the BSAExperiment variantFilter vector
